title: When you get your main in ARAM

replies.body:
And then someone dodges

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/random-ness/images/9/9f/Darth_vader_no.gif/revision/latest?cb=20120616003315

This happened to me recently.

Just so happens I queued 3 separate times (the main dodge was the first dodge) and someone dodged 3 times.

Look at it from a different perspective.

They sensed your immense power and fled like the cowards they are! >:D
I've had my main, someone dodged and in the next one someone else got my main and wouldn't trade... It's just cruel
Morgana in aram hnngghhh
tank morg for funtrolltimes (after zhonyas at least. maybe get roa too)

Main jungler: {{champion:48}} I usually have 4 deaths or less and a 6+ KDA
Main Support: {{champion:12}} Go AP bruiser and never die... usually at least 40 assists.
Main mid: {{champion:74}} It's good to be a lane bully in a single lane world...
Main top: {{champion:78}} Hehe... Hahaha... A-HAHA-AHAHHAAAA!!!
Main ADC: {{champion:22}} something like 90% win rate on ARAM with this one...

poppy jungle is one of my favorite jungles right now... just gets absolutely terrifying.  You just get chilling smite without upgading it further into triforce/cooldown boots and hydra or botrk(or both).  Poppy is the epitome of jungler tower diving made easy as you just ult and take tower agro then tower crush the enemies soul repeatedly.
Haven't been gutsy enough to try her in the jungle yet, but I think it would be worth a shot. Do you normally build her AP, AD, or Hybrid in the jungle?

Definitely ad... A guy playing under the name "opened" plays poppy jungle at a diamond 1 jungle level last I checked and he does the blue smite(unupgraded) into triforce into cdr boots into botrk usually.  Gives you 2 targettable slows to allow you catch up and punish the enemy.  I really tiamat/hydra as it makes jungle clear insanely insanely fast as the next item and then after that you can grab whatever you want.  I have been toying around with zephyr as a last item as it makes for an interesting next option for the awesome movespeed and tenacity it provides when ult is down or you ult someone that has some cc plus the AS to go with your really high ad at this point).  AD poppy is just so hard to itemize against as your triforce-Q does all magic damage but your triforce anything else does AD.
AD

Have you ever tried red smite plus ult?
Haven't done it in a while but its amazing if you have some crit.

Tbh, the kings of aram would have to be

{{champion:22}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:26}}  <----- You really learn how much damage this guy can do once u meet him in aram..

You forgot Kat, who gets fed everytime. 

I swear, some people have accounts with just Kat and play only ARAM with them.

Well, I don't play either morg or Zliean, but yeah, they are pretty good.

I actually hate Zilean in ARAM, because most of the time they think they are immortal and go way too ham before realizing their ult actually has a CD now. Ever since the rework, I have not seen a Zilean do well on ARAM, where before they would go 40-0-0 or something absurd like that.

Morg is definitely good on ARAM, but only about as good as any other long range poke mage with moderate sustain.
Then someone in the other team quits.{{item:3073}}
And then you remember you main immobile melees.
{{summoner:32}} {{summoner:31}}  And then you laugh because your immobile melee is sitting right in the middle of their team exactly where it wants to be every 40 seconds.

Never got the mark/dash hype, you usually end up dying if you use it to dash alone into the middle of their team. Especially with all the tower turtling that goes on in the average aram game, I usually only get to use it to catch and kill people who escape at low health after a fight or skirmish. It certainly helps the immobile melee experience but after the nerfs it doesn't quite put them on par with poke mages and assassins.
and then you remember it's your main so you're good at immobile melees {{champion:122}}

Haha, Darius is an entirely different beast. I can still carry on him, pretty much anyone else though and I'm forced to build full tank if I want to do anything useful. 
{{champion:86}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:54}}
Yup, with Darius you can build full damage and still be useful by destroying everyone
I somehow went like 16/7/32 with {{champion:122}} on ARAM once.
When you main {{champion:77}} (Phoenix) but then theres an {{champion:22}} on their team..

{{champion:16}} Neat! I get to play my favorite champion!
5 minutes later: Oh yeah, I'm only half of Soraka.
15 minutes later, enemy team bought 2 morellonomicons: Now I'm 1/4 of a Soraka...
Wish removes grievous wounds before it heals, hopefully bring your teammates up past 50% so you can top them off quickly :3
That works out fine in normals, but it feels like In ARAM that only helps for a second. Mages tend to get free reign to cast all the way to your backline since there's no jungle to hide in.
i can't believe no one has posted for the sole reason of TOM BAKER the bestest Doctor ever, but i guess.... WHO KNOWS?

I love Doctor Who.

I admit it, I'm a 10th/11th scrub, but you can't deny classic was pretty gud.

{{champion:75}} {{item:3070}} 

But my main assassin is {{champion:55}} so those games always turnout well.

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ytyYE5rU,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-06-12T05:38:35.033+0000)
>
> {{champion:75}} {{item:3070}} 

I almost always do well as Nasus on aram.

As tank Nasus. And I main him.

My highest is 672 stacks on ARAM if that matters any.
How do you get anywhere near those kind of stacks as Nasus? There's only one lane of minions and everyone on your team is trying to take them.

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ytyYE5rU,comment-id=000500010000,timestamp=2015-06-13T01:01:13.364+0000)
>
> How do you get anywhere near those kind of stacks as Nasus? There's only one lane of minions and everyone on your team is trying to take them.

I had 3 friends with me in the game.

And for those where its just solo aram, I usually average around 300 stacks or higher at the end of the game. I usually get these amount of stacks by starting sheen with 5 pots, and with my runepage I can survive for awhile before my first death unless I get perma cc'ed.

Also, even with little stacks your still surprisingly powerful when you hit 6, due to the amount of times you can proc your sheen.
Eh, I should try it out. Most games when I roll Nasus I just don't bother with stacks and build AP (which takes FOREVER)

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ytyYE5rU,comment-id=00050001000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-13T01:42:39.423+0000)
>
> Eh, I should try it out. Most games when I roll Nasus I just don't bother with stacks and build AP (which takes FOREVER)

I always, always, ALWAYS want to get AP Nasus to work. The problem is it takes so long to get the items for your damage, but by then everyone outscales you half the time, even if you max E first.

I only ever go it anymore if our entire team is AD. Otherwise, tank nasus is safer, easier, and better for me to play 9.9/10. Also the snowball summoner spell addition is really neat for getting those +6's.
upvoted for tom baker.

I have a few "mains", not just one, but...{{champion:56}} is still kinda fun in ARAM, even if you sorta have to build a ton of AD and pretty much spam Duskbringer everywhere. Decent damage, spell shield works to block Jinx bullets/Ashe arrows/Whatever from hitting your team.

I posed something like this and got reported since "suicide is a touchy subject". just a word of warning for you, one offended person and riot sends you a warning not to do it again or you get banned from the boards entirely...
I'm not too worried about being reported, but it actually is a pretty touchy subject. Deleting my comment.
I didn't read your comment before it was deleted, but even I sometimes delete comments if I think they went a little too far. But thanks, if it was offensive, for taking the initiative.
It was just an image... a meme of sorts.... I didn't really consider how it could be interpreted

Whenever I get my main, I always reroll or trade.
I play ARAM to get stomped into the ground because I cant play whoever I got, not to carry.
Let Twisted Fate do that!
Give me {{champion:103}}, {{champion:22}}, and/or {{champion:37}} and I'll be happy.... then they dodge.... they always do.
{{champion:110}}  Team gets 10 kills in 5 minutes, 9 of them are from your Q.

its funny, despite how much i like playing Garen, it seems like i never get him on aram.  I always worry that its gonna suck because im all melee, but then i remember my passive, and think "what harass?"
snowball has made champs like garen immensely more fun to play in aram... I used to hate getting garen in aram but now its all good.

my main is eve.
lol..
And then the enemy team is full of your counters. Q.Q
